summary.span: 表示一个从托管 ASP.NET Web 应用程序的服务器请求的 .aspx 文件（也称为 Web 窗体页）。

span.span: Represents an .aspx file, also known as a Web Forms page, requested from a server that hosts an ASP.NET Web application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类与扩展名为 .aspx 的文件相关联。The class is associated with files that have an .aspx extension. 这些文件在运行时编译为 对象并缓存在服务器内存中。These files are compiled at run time as objects and cached in server memory. 如果要使用代码隐藏方法创建 Web 窗体页，请从此类派生。If you want to create a Web Forms page using the code-behind technique, derive from this class. 快速应用程序开发（RAD）设计器（如 Microsoft Visual Studio）会自动使用此模型创建 Web 窗体页。Rapid application development (RAD) designers, such as Microsoft Visual Studio, automatically use this model to create Web Forms pages. 对象用作页面中所有服务器控件的命名容器，但实现 接口的元素或作为实现此接口的控件的子控件。The object serves as the naming container for all server controls in a page, except those that implement the interface or are child controls of controls that implement this interface. 类是一个控件，它充当 Web 应用程序的用户界面，因此应进行仔细审查以确保编写安全代码和确保应用程序安全的最佳做法。The class is a control that acts as the user interface for your Web application, and as such should be scrutinized to make sure best practices for writing secure code and securing applications are followed. 有关这些主题的常规信息，请参阅[Web 应用程序安全威胁概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/f13d73y6(v=vs.140))、[安全策略最佳实践](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/sa4se9bc(v=vs.100))和[主要安全概念](/dotnet/standard/security/key-security-concepts)。For general information on these topics, see [Overview of Web Application Security Threats](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/f13d73y6(v=vs.140)), [Security Policy Best Practices](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/sa4se9bc(v=vs.100)), and [Key Security Concepts](/dotnet/standard/security/key-security-concepts). 有关更具体的信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178270(v=vs.100))的安全、[如何：显示安全错误消息](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/994a1482(v=vs.100))、[如何：通过将 HTML 编码应用于字符串来保护 Web 应用程序中的脚本攻击](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/a2a4yykt(v=vs.100))，以及[验证控件简介](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/2e4hd649(v=vs.85))。For more specific information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178270(v=vs.100)), [How to: Display Safe Error Messages](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/994a1482(v=vs.100)), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/a2a4yykt(v=vs.100)), and [Introduction to the Validation Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/2e4hd649(v=vs.85)). ## Examples 本主题提供了包含源代码的 Visual Studio 网站项目：[下载](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192425)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192425). 下面的代码示例演示如何在代码隐藏页模型中使用 类。The following code example demonstrates how the class is used in the code-behind page model. 请注意，代码隐藏源文件声明一个从基本页类继承的分部类。Note that the code-behind source file declares a partial class that inherits from a base page class. 可以 基页类，也可以是从 派生的另一个类。The base page class can be , or it can be another class that derives from . 此外，请注意，分部类允许代码隐藏文件使用页面上定义的控件，而无需将它们定义为字段成员。Furthermore, note that the partial class allows the code-behind file to use controls defined on the page without the need to define them as field members. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Page_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page_Overview/cs/pageexample.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Page_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page_Overview/vb/pageexample.aspx.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例演示与前面的代码隐藏源文件相对应的 .aspx 文件。The following code example shows the .aspx file that corresponds to the preceding code-behind source file. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.Page_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page_Overview/cs/pageexample.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.Page_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page_Overview/vb/pageexample.aspx#1)] 必须使用[@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100))指令并使用 `Inherits` 和 `CodeFile` 属性将代码隐藏文件链接到 .aspx 文件。You must use the [@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100)) directive and use the `Inherits` and `CodeFile` attributes to link the code-behind file to the .aspx file. 在此示例中，`Inherits` 特性指示 `MyCodeBehind` 类，`CodeFile` 特性指示包含该类的特定于语言的文件的路径。In this example, the `Inherits` attribute indicates the `MyCodeBehind` class and the `CodeFile` attribute indicates the path to the language-specific file that contains the class. 下面的代码示例演示了单文件页模型，以及如何访问 属性和 的 属性。The following code example demonstrates the single-file page model and how to access the property and the property of the . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.Page_Overview2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page_Overview2/cs/pageexample.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.Page_Overview2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page_Overview2/vb/pageexample.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 为异步页注册不需要状态信息的开始和结束事件处理程序委托。

span.span: Registers beginning and ending event handler delegates that do not require state information for an asynchronous page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可向异步网页添加处理程序。Use the method to add handlers to an asynchronous Web page. 可以注册多个异步处理程序;但是，一次只能运行一个处理程序。You can register multiple asynchronous handlers; however, only one handler runs at a time. 如果要同时处理多个异步方法，应使用单个 方法，并从该处理程序启动多个异步操作。If you want to process multiple asynchronous methods simultaneously, you should use a single method and launch multiple asynchronous operations from that handler. 在 和 事件之间调用异步处理程序。The asynchronous handlers are called between the and events. 首先，将运行所有 事件（通过 事件），然后调用每个注册的 方法。First, all events (through the event) are run, and then each registered method is called. 当处理程序完成时，将调用相应的 方法。When the handler completes, the corresponding method is called. 如果有多个异步处理程序，则调用下一个处理程序。If there are multiple asynchronous handlers, the next handler is called. 调用已注册的异步事件处理程序后，将从 事件开始调用其余的页面事件。After the registered asynchronous event handlers have been called, the rest of the page events are called, beginning with the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用异步请求在 控件中显示本地 Web 服务器默认页的 HTML 源代码。The following code example uses an asynchronous request to display the HTML source code of the local Web server's default page in a control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法将需要状态信息的处理程序添加到异步网页中。Use the method to add handlers that require state information to an asynchronous Web page. 在 `state` 参数中传递的对象可以是应用程序在 `beginHandler` 和 `endHandler` 参数中指定的事件处理程序委托之间传输信息所需的任何对象。The object passed in the `state` parameter can be any object that your application requires to transfer information between event handler delegates specified in the `beginHandler` and the `endHandler` parameters. 可以注册多个异步处理程序;但是，一次只能运行一个处理程序。You can register multiple asynchronous handlers; however, only one handler runs at a time. 如果要同时处理多个异步方法，应使用单个 方法，并从该处理程序启动多个异步操作。If you want to process multiple asynchronous methods simultaneously, you should use a single method and launch multiple asynchronous operations from that handler. 在 和 事件之间调用异步处理程序。The asynchronous handlers are called between the and events. 首先，将运行所有 事件（通过 事件），然后调用每个注册的 方法。First, all events (through the event) are run, and then each registered method is called. 当处理程序完成时，将调用相应的 方法。When the handler completes, the corresponding method is called. 如果有多个异步处理程序，则调用下一个处理程序。If there are multiple asynchronous handlers, the next handler is called. 调用已注册的异步事件处理程序后，将从 事件开始调用其余的页面事件。After the registered asynchronous event handlers have been called, the rest of the page events are called, beginning with the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用异步请求在 控件中显示本地 Web 服务器默认页的 HTML 源代码。The following code example uses an asynchronous request to display the HTML source code of the local Web server's default page in a control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法添加构成当前页的文件列表，如用户控件文件。The method adds a list of files, such as user control files, that make up the current page. 如果修改了其中的任何页，则在下一次请求页面时，将编译整个页面。If any of these pages is modified, the entire page is compiled the next time it is requested. 此方法支持 .NET Framework 基础结构，但不适合直接在代码中使用。This method supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设置为 `true`时，此属性允许在单线程单元（STA）线程上执行页面。When set to `true`, this property allows the page to be executed on a single-threaded apartment (STA) thread. 这允许页面调用 STA 组件，如 Visual Basic 6.0 开发的组件。This allows the page to call STA components, such as components developed with Visual Basic 6.0. 将此属性设置为 `true` 还允许页面调用需要访问非托管 ASP 内置对象的 COM + 组件。Setting this property to `true` also allows the page to call COM+ components that require access to the unmanaged ASP built-in objects. 可通过 ASP `ObjectContext` 对象或 `OnStartPage` 方法来访问这些对象。These are accessible through the ASP `ObjectContext` object or the `OnStartPage` method. 在大多数情况下，不要在代码中设置此属性。In most circumstances, do not set this property in code. 使用 .aspx 文件中的[@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100))指令将 `aspcompat` 特性设置为 `true`。Set the `aspcompat` attribute to `true` using the [@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100)) directive in the .aspx file. 请求页面时，动态生成的类会设置属性。When the page is requested, the dynamically generated class sets the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，它指示处理异步任务时使用的超时间隔。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the time-out interval used when processing asynchronous tasks.

value.span: 一个 ，包含完成异步任务所允许的时间间隔。

span.span: A that contains the allowed time interval for completion of the asynchronous task.

value.span: 默认时间间隔为 45 秒。

span.span: The default time interval is 45 seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 页面的异步超时表示页面将等待执行异步任务的时间量。The asynchronous time-out of the page represents the amount of time that the page will wait to perform asynchronous tasks. 在大多数情况下，不要在代码中设置此属性。In most circumstances, do not set this property in code. 使用 Web 配置文件或[@ page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100))指令中的[pages 元素](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/950xf363(v=vs.100))设置页面异步超时间隔。Set the page asynchronous time-out interval using the [pages element](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/950xf363(v=vs.100)) of the Web configuration file or in the [@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100)) directive. 页面指令将覆盖页面配置节中设置的值。Values set in the page configuration section are overwritten by the page directive. 使用 类定义异步任务并注册开始时间、结束时间和超时处理程序。Define your asynchronous task using the class and register a beginning, an ending, and a time-out handler. 如果异步任务未在指定的时间间隔内完成，则将调用超时处理程序。If the asynchronous task does not complete in the time interval specified, the time-out handler will be invoked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 属性与 和 方法一起使用。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with the and methods. 请注意开始、结束和超时处理程序的使用。Note the use of beginning, ending, and time-out handlers. 在此示例中，引入了一个人工延迟，以演示异步任务的情况，超过了在 属性中指定的任务所分配的时间。In the example, an artificial delay is introduced to demonstrate the situation of an asynchronous task exceeding the allotted time for the task as specified in the property. 在实际方案中，可以使用异步任务执行数据库调用或映像生成，例如，如果在指定的时间内未执行任务，超时处理程序会提供适度的降级。In a real-world scenario, an asynchronous task could be used to perform database calls or image generation, for example, and the time-out handler provides graceful degradation if the task is not performed in a specified amount of time. 请注意， 属性是在 page 指令中设置的。Note that the property is set in the page directive. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout/CS/page_asynctask.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout/vb/page_asynctask.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout/CS/page_asynctask.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout/vb/page_asynctask.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用应用程序的 对象，可以在后续请求中存储和检索任意数据。An application's object allows you to store and retrieve arbitrary data on subsequent requests. 缓存与页面或用户会话无关。The cache is not specifically associated with a page or user session. 它主要用于提高应用程序性能。It is used primarily to enhance application performance. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缓存应用程序数据](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/6hbbsfk6(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Caching Application Data](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/6hbbsfk6(v=vs.100)). 有关应用程序缓存和页面输出缓存之间区别的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 缓存概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178597(v=vs.100))。For more information on the difference between application caching and page output caching, see [ASP.NET Caching Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178597(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 属性将两个整数的和插入到 对象中。The following code example inserts the sum of two integers into the object using the property. 然后，它使用 方法检索该值，并将其写入 的 Web 服务器控件。It then retrieves the value using the method and writes it to a Web server control. member this.ClientTarget : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值使您得以重写对浏览器功能的自动检测，并指定针对特定的浏览器客户端页的呈现方式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that allows you to override automatic detection of browser capabilities and to specify how a page is rendered for particular browser clients.

value.span: ，指定要重写的浏览器功能。

span.span: A that specifies the browser capabilities that you want to override.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未设置 属性，与 属性关联的 对象将反映客户端浏览器的功能。If you do not set the property, the object associated with the property reflects the capabilities of the client browser. 如果设置此属性，则将禁用客户端浏览器检测，并使用与你提供的值（别名）关联的浏览器功能。If you do set this property, client browser detection is disabled and the page will use browser capabilities associated with the value (alias) that you provide. Web 服务器计算机上的根 web.config 配置文件定义了以下默认别名，你可以将其用作常见用户代理字符串的简写形式：The root Web.config configuration file on the Web server computer defines the following default aliases that you can use as shorthand for common user-agent strings: - `uplevel`，它指定与 Internet Explorer 6.0 等效的浏览器功能。`uplevel`, which specifies browser capabilities equivalent to Internet Explorer 6.0. - `downlevel`，它指定与不支持客户端脚本的旧版浏览器等效的浏览器功能。`downlevel`, which specifies browser capabilities equivalent to older browsers that do not support client script. 您可以使用此别名来确定网页如何在已禁用客户端脚本的浏览器中工作。You can use this alias to determine how Web pages would work in a browser that has client script disabled. 您可以使用此属性以编程方式设置别名，也可以使用[@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100))指令的 `ClientTarget` 属性以声明方式进行设置。You can set the alias programmatically using this property, or you can set it declaratively using the `ClientTarget` attribute of the [@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100)) directive. 可以在应用程序级别的 Web.config 文件的 `clientTarget` 节中定义其他别名。You can define additional aliases in the `clientTarget` section of the application-level Web.config file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ClientTarget 元素（ASP.NET Settings Schema）](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/6379d90d(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [clientTarget Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/6379d90d(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义了一个 `ie302` 别名，并包含在其 Web.config 文件中配置应用程序所需的部分。The following code example defines an `ie302` alias and includes sections needed to configure your application in its Web.config file. 使用此别名，你可以将 属性设置为 `ie302` 并专门针对 Internet Explorer 3.02 浏览器自定义页面。Using this alias, you can set the property to `ie302` and customize pages specifically for Internet Explorer 3.02 browsers. ```xml ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 .aspx 文件的[@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100))指令中设置 `Culture` 特性。Set the `Culture` attribute in the [@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100)) directive in the .aspx file. 请求页面时，动态生成的类将设置此属性的值。When the page is requested, the dynamically generated class sets the value of this property. 此外，还可以通过编程方式或在 web.config 文件的[全球化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/hy4kkhe0(v=vs.100))元素中显式设置 属性的值。In addition, you can also explicitly set the value of the property programmatically or in the [globalization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/hy4kkhe0(v=vs.100)) element of the Web.config file. 属性用于帮助本地化页面内容。The property is used to help localize page content. 可以将其设置为任何有效的区域性 ID。You can set it to any valid culture ID. 例如，`en-us` 区域性 ID 将页面设置为美国英语，而 `fr` 区域性 ID 则将页面设置为法语。For example, the `en-us` culture ID sets the page to American English, while the `fr` culture ID sets the page to French. 你还可以将值设置为 `auto` 这将自动检测浏览器的首选语言并对其进行设置。You can also set the value to `auto` which will perform automatic detection of the browser's preferred language and set it. 可以使用默认值（例如 `auto:en-us`）限定自动语言检测。The automatic language detection can be qualified with a default value such as `auto:en-us`. 有关详细信息，请参阅 类概述。For more information, see the class overview.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示页面验证回发事件，还是验证回调事件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the page validates postback and callback events.

value.span: 如果该页验证回发和回调事件，则 ;否则，。

span.span: if the page validates postback and callback events; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置为 `true`时，ASP.NET 将验证控件事件是否源自该控件呈现的用户界面。When the property is set to `true`, ASP.NET validates that a control event originated from the user interface that was rendered by that control. 控件在呈现期间注册其事件，然后在回发或回调处理期间验证事件。A control registers its events during rendering and then validates the events during postback or callback handling. 例如，如果在呈现页面时列表控件包含编号为1、2或3的选项，并且收到指定选项编号4的回发请求，ASP.NET 将引发异常。For example, if a list control includes options numbered 1, 2, or 3 when the page is rendered, and if a postback request is received specifying option number 4, ASP.NET raises an exception. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 中的所有事件驱动型控件都使用此功能。All event-driven controls in ASP.NET use this feature by default. 如果编写在运行时更改客户端中的控件的客户端脚本，则可能必须使用 方法来避免错误的事件验证错误。If you write client script that changes a control in the client at run time, you might have to use the method in order to avoid false event validation errors. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此功能降低了未经授权的或恶意的回发请求和回调的风险。This feature reduces the risk of unauthorized or malicious postback requests and callbacks. 强烈建议您不要禁用事件验证。It is strongly recommended that you do not disable event validation. 设置 属性的方法是：设置[@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100))指令的 `enableEventValidation` 属性或 web.config 文件中[pages](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/950xf363(v=vs.100))元素的 `enableEventValidation` 特性。You set the property by setting the `enableEventValidation` attribute of the [@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100)) directive or the `enableEventValidation` attribute of the [pages](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/950xf363(v=vs.100)) element in the Web.config file. 如果在代码中设置此属性，则必须在初始化页面之前设置此属性。If you set this property in code, you must set it before the page is initialized.

exception.span: 属性是在初始化页后设置的。

span.span: The property was set after the page was initialized.
Validation ASP.NET Controls

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当前页请求结束时该页是否保持其视图状态以及它包含的任何服务器控件的视图状态。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关为何要禁用视图状态的信息，请参阅 。For information about why you might want to disable view state, see . 即使 `false`，该页面也可能包含 ASP.NET 用于检测回发的隐藏视图状态字段。Even if is `false`, the page might contain a hidden view state field that is used by ASP.NET to detect a postback. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 属性设置为加载页面时 `false`。The following code example sets the property to `false` when the page is loaded. 这将禁用 对象的视图状态，这意味着页面的视图状态信息和页面中包含的任何控件都不会保存。This disables view state for the object, meaning that neither view-state information for the page nor any controls contained by the page are saved. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示从客户端回发页时，ASP.NET 是否应在页的视图状态下检查消息身份验证代码 (MAC)。

value.span: 如果应对视图状态进行 MAC 检查和编码，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the view state should be MAC checked and encoded; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 视图状态 MAC 是隐藏变量的加密版本，当页面发送到浏览器时，该页的视图状态将保存到该变量中。A view-state MAC is an encrypted version of the hidden variable that a page's view state is persisted to when the page is sent to the browser. 如果将此属性设置为 "`true`"，则会检查加密的视图状态，以确认它在客户端上未被篡改。When this property is set to `true`, the encrypted view state is checked to verify that it has not been tampered with on the client. 不要在代码中设置此属性。Do not set this property in code. 使用 .aspx 文件中的[@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100))指令设置 `EnableViewStateMac` 特性。Set the `EnableViewStateMac` attribute using the [@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100)) directive in the .aspx file. 请求页面时，动态生成的类会设置属性。When the page is requested, the dynamically generated class sets the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 即使应用程序或页面不使用视图状态，也不应将此属性设置为在生产网站中 `false`。This attribute should never be set to `false` in a production Web site, even if the application or page does not use view state. 视图状态 MAC 有助于确保其他 ASP.NET 函数的安全性以及视图状态。The view state MAC helps ensure the security of other ASP.NET functions in addition to view state.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ExecuteRegisteredAsyncTasks() cil managed

summary.span: 开始执行异步任务。

span.span: Starts the execution of an asynchronous task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类定义异步任务。Define an asynchronous task using the class. 定义该任务并使用 方法向页面注册该任务后，可以调用 方法来开始异步任务。After the task is defined, and is registered with the page using the method, the method can be invoked to begin the asynchronous task. 如果存在任何已注册的异步任务（如果存在），则会在页面处理中自动调用 方法。The method is automatically called at the point in the page processing when any registered asynchronous tasks, if they exist, are invoked for a non-asynchronous page. 对 进行的自动调用刚好出现在 事件之前。This automatic call to occurs just before the event. 对于想要在非此方法的自动调用的时候调用的任务，请调用 方法。Call the method for tasks you want to be invoked at times other than the automatic call to this method. 请注意，异步任务仅会执行一次，即使 可能被多次调用。Note, asynchronous tasks will be executed only once even though may be called more than once. 每次调用 方法时， 属性都将重置。The property is reset on every call to the method. 在调用 方法之前， 的最后一个值优先。The last value of the prior to invoking the method takes precedence. 如果异步任务所用的 超出了，则 调用期间调用的后续任务会立即超时。If an asynchronous task takes more than the , subsequent tasks invoked during that call are timed out immediately. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 属性与 和 方法一起使用。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with the and methods. 请注意开始、结束和超时处理程序的使用。Note the use of beginning, ending, and time-out handlers. 在此示例中，引入了一个人工延迟，以演示异步任务的情况，超过了在 属性中指定的任务所分配的时间。In the example, an artificial delay is introduced to demonstrate the situation of an asynchronous task exceeding the allotted time for the task as specified in the property. 在实际方案中，可以使用异步任务执行数据库调用或映像生成，例如，如果在指定的时间内未执行任务，超时处理程序会提供适度的降级。In a real-world scenario, an asynchronous task could be used to perform database calls or image generation, for example, and the time-out handler provides graceful degradation if the task is not performed in a specified amount of time. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout/CS/page_asynctask.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout/vb/page_asynctask.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout/CS/page_asynctask.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout/vb/page_asynctask.vb#2)]

exception.span: 异步任务中有异常。

span.span: There is an exception in the asynchronous task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 提供了两种机制，用于将控件从一个页传输到另一个页。ASP.NET provides two mechanisms for transferring control from one page to another. 您可以使用 方法在页之间传输处理，也可以通过将页 URL 分配给实现 接口的按钮控件的 属性来进行跨页面请求。You can use the method to transfer processing between pages, or you can make a cross-page request by assigning a page URL to the property of a button control that implements the interface. 在任一情况下， page 属性都将包含一个对象，该对象表示上一页或发信方。In either case, the page property will contain an object that represents the previous or originator page. 例如，如果页 a 发送到页 B，则页 A 的 属性（可通过 属性访问）将 `true`，并且页 B 的 属性将具有页 A 的名称。If, for example, Page A posts to Page B, Page A's property (accessible through the property) will be `true` and Page B's property will have the name of Page A.

ASP.NET 包括 类的两个子代， 类，用于将状态信息保存在 ASP.NET 页包含的隐藏字段中，以及在与请求关联的 对象中保存状态的 类。ASP.NET includes two descendents of the class, the class that saves state information in a hidden field included in the ASP.NET page, and the class that saves state in the object associated with the request. 若要在所选位置保存状态，应创建 类的新子代，以将状态保存并加载到所选的持久性介质。To save state in the location of your choice, you should create a new descendent of the class that saves and loads state to the persistence medium of your choice. 有关创建新 对象的示例，请参阅 类。For an example of creating a new object, see the class. 如果你使用的是 .NET Framework 版本1.0 或1.1，若要从隐藏字段之外的任何内容加载 状态，请重写此方法。If you are using the .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, override this method if you want to load the state from anything other than a hidden field. 如果选择这样做，则还必须重写 方法。If you choose to do so, you must also override the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将 属性设置为正数，则发送到客户端浏览器的视图状态将被拆分为多个隐藏字段，并且每个字段的值小于在 属性中指定的大小。When the property is set to a positive number, the view state sent to the client browser is broken into multiple hidden fields, and each field's value is less than the size specified in the property. 如果将 属性设置为负数（默认值），则指示不应将视图状态字段分为多个块。Setting the property to a negative number (the default) indicates that the view-state field should not be separated into chunks. 将 设置为较小的数字可能会导致性能不佳。Setting the to a small number may result in poor performance. 在 web.config 文件的[pages 元素](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/950xf363(v=vs.100))中设置 属性的值。Set the value of the property in the [pages element](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/950xf363(v=vs.100)) of the Web.config file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML `meta` 元素可用于改进搜索引擎列表。HTML `meta` elements can be used to improve search-engine listings. 某些搜索引擎使用 "说明" `meta` 元素来改善列表预览。The "description" `meta` element is used by some search engines to improve listing previews. 如果页面标记的 `head` 元素中没有 "description" `meta` 元素，则在呈现该页时，`meta` 元素将添加到页面中。If there is no "description" `meta` element in the `head` element of the page markup, the `meta` element is added to the page when the page is rendered. 如果该页标记已有 `meta` 元素的 "description"，则此属性获取或设置 `meta` 元素的 `content` 属性。If the page markup already has a "description" `meta` element, this property gets or sets the `content` attribute of the `meta` element. 您还可以在[@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100))指令中设置此属性。You can also set this property in the [@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100)) directive. ## Examples 如果将页的 "" 属性设置为 "ASP.NET 概述"，则将在呈现的 HTML 中显示以下元素：If you set the property of a page to "ASP.NET Overview", the following element will appear in the rendered HTML: ``

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML `meta` 元素可用于改进搜索引擎列表。HTML `meta` elements can be used to improve search-engine listings. "关键字" `meta` 元素根本不使用，或由主要搜索引擎为其赋予非常小的权重。The "keywords" `meta` element is either not used at all or is given very little weight by the major search engines. 如果页面标记的 `head` 元素中没有 "关键字" `meta` 元素，则在呈现页面时，`meta` 元素将添加到页面中。If there is no "keywords" `meta` element in the `head` element of the page markup, the `meta` element is added to the page when the page is rendered. 如果页面标记已有 `meta` 元素的 "关键字"，则此属性将获取或设置 `meta` 元素的 `content` 属性。If the page markup already has a "keywords" `meta` element, this property gets or sets the `content` attribute of the `meta` element. 您还可以在[@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100))指令中设置此属性。You can also set this property in the [@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100)) directive. ## Examples 如果将页的 属性设置为 "HTML，CSS，XML，JavaScript"，则在呈现的 HTML 中将显示以下元素：If you set the property of a page to "HTML,CSS,XML,JavaScript", the following element will appear in the rendered HTML: ``

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法执行创建 实例所需的初始化和设置步骤。The method performs the initialization and setup steps required to create a instance. 在该页生命周期的此阶段中，将页上声明的服务器控件初始化为其默认状态;但是，每个控件的视图状态尚未填充。In this stage of the page's life cycle, declared server controls on the page are initialized to their default state; however, the view state of each control is not yet populated. 在 `Page_Init` 阶段，页面上的控件不能访问其他服务器控件，无论其他控件是子控件还是父控件。A control on the page cannot access other server controls on the page during the `Page_Init` phase, regardless of whether the other controls are child or parent controls. 不保证其他服务器控件已创建并且可供访问。Other server controls are not guaranteed to be created and ready for access. 方法在 方法之后、 方法之前调用。The method is called after the method and before the method. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回特定的 对象，该对象修改请求浏览器的 对象的行为。The property returns the specific object that modifies the behavior of the object for the requesting browser. 特定 对象是通过检查传入 对象的特征来确定的。The specific object is determined by examining characteristics of the incoming object. 为请求选择适配器时， 对象上的任何生命周期事件都将覆盖 对象上的相应事件。When an adapter is chosen for the request, any life cycle events on the object override the corresponding events on the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTTP 请求和响应本质上是无状态的。HTTP requests and responses are inherently stateless. 为了保持 HTTP 请求之间的状态，ASP.NET 服务器页可以存储 状态。To maintain state between HTTP requests, ASP.NET server pages can store state. 此状态称为 "视图状态"，由页面和控件设置以及使页面和控件显示的数据与用户在页面上最后一次往返行程中的显示方式相同。This state, called view state, consists of page and control settings and data that make the page and controls appear as if they are the same ones that the user saw and interacted with on their last round trip to the page. 有多种机制可用于在对相同页面的连续请求之间存储视图状态。Several mechanisms exist to store view state between successive requests to the same page. Abstract 类表示这些状态存储机制的基类。The abstract class represents the base class for these state storage mechanisms. 页面开发人员通常不需要使用 属性。Page developers will typically not need to use the property. 属性主要由控件开发人员用来扩展 类的功能。The property is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件使你可以检查页面请求的条件，例如是否加载页面以响应回发。This event enables you to check conditions of the page request, such as whether the page is being loaded in response to a postback. 还可以检查配置文件属性的值。You can also check the values of profile properties. 使用事件可以设置稍后在页面生命周期中使用的值。The event enables you to set values that are used later in the page life cycle. 您可以为请求的页面动态设置母版页或主题，并创建动态控件。You can dynamically set a master page or a theme for the requested page, and create dynamic controls. 有关 事件如何适应 ASP.NET 生命周期的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 页面生命周期概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178472(v=vs.100))。For more information about how the event fits into the ASP.NET life cycle, see [ASP.NET Page Life Cycle Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178472(v=vs.100)).

span.span: Introduction to the ASP.NET Page Life Cycle

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PreRenderComplete As EventHandler

summary.span: 在呈现页内容之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before the page content is rendered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当页生命周期的预呈现阶段完成时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when the pre-render stage of the page life cycle is complete. 在页生命周期的此阶段，会创建所有控件，所需的任何分页都已完成，并且页已准备好呈现到输出中。At this stage of the page life cycle, all controls are created, any pagination required is completed, and the page is ready to render to the output. 这是在保存页面的视图状态之前引发的最后一个事件。This is the last event raised before the page's view state is saved. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您使用 方法或使用跨页发送将处理从一个 ASP.NET 页传输到另一个页时，原始页包含可能需要用于目标页的请求信息。When you use the method or use cross-page posting to transfer processing from one ASP.NET page to another, the originating page contains request information that might be required for the destination page. 您可以使用 属性访问该信息。You can use the property to access that information. 如果当前页是由于直接请求（不是从其他页进行的传输或跨发布）而呈现的，则 属性将包含 `null`。If the current page is being rendered as a result of a direct request (not a transfer or cross-post from another page), the property contains `null`. ## Examples 下面的示例分为两部分。The following example is in two parts. 第一种方法是使用 方法，该方法在页面模型中公开为 `Server.Transfer("path")`。The first is an ASP.NET page that uses the method, exposed in the page model as `Server.Transfer("path")`. 第二部分是目标页面，它使用 属性获取第一页的标题。The second part is the target page, which uses the property to get the title of the first page. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类定义异步任务。Define an asynchronous task using the class. 定义任务后，使用 方法将任务注册到页面。When the task is defined, use the method to register the task with the page. 注册任务后，调用 方法以开始异步任务。After registering the task, invoke the method to begin the asynchronous task. 方法可用于同步和异步页面。The method can be used with both synchronous and asynchronous pages. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 属性与 和 方法一起使用。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with the and methods. 请注意开始、结束和超时处理程序的使用。Note the use of beginning, ending, and time-out handlers. 在此示例中，引入了一个人工延迟，以演示异步任务的情况，超过了在 属性中指定的任务所分配的时间。In the example, an artificial delay is introduced to demonstrate the situation of an asynchronous task exceeding the allotted time for the task as specified in the property. 在实际方案中，可以使用异步任务执行数据库调用或映像生成，例如，如果在指定的时间内未执行任务，超时处理程序会提供适度的降级。In a real-world scenario, an asynchronous task could be used to perform database calls or image generation, for example, and the time-out handler provides graceful degradation if the task is not performed in a specified amount of time. remarks.format: ## Remarks 要注册的控件必须实现 接口，否则将引发 。The control to be registered must implement the interface or an is raised. 当由控件实现时， 接口允许处理回发数据并引发任何回发的数据更改事件。When implemented by a control, the interface enables handling of post back data and raising of any post back data changed events. 有关服务器控件事件模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体服务器控件事件模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/y3bwdsh3(v=vs.100))。For more information on the server control event model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Server Control Event Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/y3bwdsh3(v=vs.100)). 在页生命周期的 `Page_PreRender` 事件中或之前注册控件。Register controls with the page at or before the `Page_PreRender` event of the page life cycle. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 方法，以便在任何与文本框关联的代码可以执行之前，将文本框控件 `myTextBox`。The following code example uses the method to require a text box control, `myTextBox`, to be posted back before any code associated with the text box can execute. 控件实现 接口。 controls implement the interface. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果页面正在运行以响应通过 ASP.NET 路由发出的请求，则此属性将提供对作为路由数据传递的 URL 参数值的访问。If a page is running in response to a request made through ASP.NET routing, this property provides access to the URL parameter values that were passed as route data. 如果该页在响应物理 URL 而不是路由 URL 时运行，则此属性 `null`。If the page runs in response to a physical URL instead of a route URL, this property is `null`. 下面的示例演示如何提取名为 `year`的 URL 参数的值。The following example shows how to extract the value of a URL parameter that is named `year`. ```vb Dim year As Integer = Convert.ToInt32(Page.RouteData.Values("year")) ``` ```csharp int year = Convert.ToInt32(Page.RouteData.Values["year"]) ``` 如果路由是使用域 `contoso.com`的 URL 模式 `{locale}/{year}` 定义的，并且所请求的 URL `contoso.com/US/2010`，则在此代码运行时，`year` 将包含值 "2010"。If the route is defined by using the URL pattern `{locale}/{year}` for the domain `contoso.com`, and if the requested URL is `contoso.com/US/2010`, `year` will contain the value "2010" when this code runs. 有关 ASP.NET 路由的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 路由](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/cc668201(v=vs.100))。For more information about ASP.NET routing, see [ASP.NET Routing](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/cc668201(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用 属性所引用 对象的 方法来存储页面的视图状态和控件状态信息。The method uses the method of the object referenced by the property to store view-state and control-state information for the page. ASP.NET 包括 类的两个子代， 类，用于将状态信息保存在 ASP.NET 页包含的隐藏字段中，以及在与请求关联的 对象中保存状态的 类。ASP.NET includes two descendents of the class, the class that saves state information in a hidden field included in the ASP.NET page, and the class that saves state in the object associated with the request. 请注意，使用 类时，仍会呈现隐藏的视图状态字段，因为这用于确定回发。Note that when using the class the hidden VIEWSTATE field is still rendered as this is used to determine post back. 若要在所选位置保存状态，应创建 类的新子代，以将状态保存并加载到所选的持久性介质。To save state in the location of your choice, you should create a new descendent of the class that saves and loads state to the persistence medium of your choice. 有关创建新 对象的示例，请参阅 类。For an example of creating a new object, see the class. 如果你使用的是 .NET Framework 版本1.0 或1.1，则重写此方法（如果你想要将 状态保存为除隐藏字段之外的任何内容）。If you are using the .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, override this method if you want to save the state in anything other than a hidden field. 如果选择这样做，则还必须重写 方法。If you choose to do so, you must also override the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 网页上的控件的状态信息将在 事件之后保存。State information for controls on the Web page is saved after the event. 事件是在页的视图状态和控件状态保存到持久性介质中后引发的。The event is raised after the view state and control state of the page and controls on the page are saved to the persistence medium. 这是在向请求浏览器呈现页面之前引发的最后一个事件。This is the last event raised before the page is rendered to the requesting browser. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性提供有关当前请求的会话的信息。This property provides information about the current request's session. 为每个请求 ASP.NET 应用程序中的页面或文档的用户维护一个 `Session` 对象。A `Session` object is maintained for each user that requests a page or document from an ASP.NET application. 当用户从应用程序中的页面移到页面时，不会丢弃 `Session` 对象中存储的变量;相反，只要用户访问应用程序中的页，这些变量就会保持不变。Variables stored in the `Session` object are not discarded when the user moves from page to page in the application; instead, these variables persist as long as the user is accessing pages in your application. 有关会话状态的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 会话状态概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178581(v=vs.100))。For more information about session state, see [ASP.NET Session State Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178581(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 `GetStyle` 函数，该函数检索在 Web 窗体页的会话状态中存储的密钥并将其值转换为字符串。The following code example creates a `GetStyle` function that retrieves a key stored in the session state of the Web Forms page and converts its value to a string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在大多数情况下，不要在代码中设置此属性。In most circumstances, do not set this property in code. 将 `SmartNavigation` 特性设置为 .aspx 文件的[@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100))指令中的 `true`。Set the `SmartNavigation` attribute to `true` in the [@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100)) directive in the .aspx file. 请求页面时，动态生成的类将设置此属性。When the page is requested, the dynamically generated class sets this property. > [!NOTE] > 在 ASP.NET 版本2.0 中， 属性已弃用。In ASP.NET version 2.0, the property is deprecated. 请改用 方法和 属性。Use the method and the property instead. 当 Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.5 browser 或更高版本请求某个页面时，智能导航将通过执行以下操作来增强用户的页面体验：When a page is requested by Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.5 browser, or later, smart navigation enhances the user's experience of the page by performing the following: - 消除由导航引起的闪烁。Eliminating the flash caused by navigation. - 在从页面移动到页面时保留滚动位置。Persisting the scroll position when moving from page to page. - 在导航之间保持元素焦点。Persisting element focus between navigations. - 仅保留浏览器历史记录中的最后一页状态。Retaining only the last page state in the browser's history. 智能导航最适用于需要频繁回发的 ASP.NET 页面，但其视觉内容在返回时不会发生显著变化。Smart navigation is best used with ASP.NET pages that require frequent postbacks but with visual content that does not change dramatically on return. 确定是否将此属性设置为 `true`时，请仔细考虑这一点。Consider this carefully when deciding whether to set this property to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性不直接引用级联样式表（CSS）。This property does not refer directly to a cascading style sheet (CSS). 属性包含 ASP.NET 主题的名称，可在其中包含 CSS 文件。The property contains the name of an ASP.NET theme, which can include CSS files within it. 属性指定在页面生命周期早期应用于页面的主题的名称，而 属性指定在页面生命周期后期应用于页面的主题的名称。The property specifies the name of a theme that is applied to a page early in the page life cycle, whereas the property specifies the name of a theme that is applied to a page later in the page life cycle. 这意味着页面上的设置优先于样式表主题中的设置。This means that settings on the page take precedence over settings in the style sheet theme. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). 通常，可以在页面指令中设置此属性的值，也可以通过重写属性来设置此属性的值。You typically set a value for this property in the page directive or by overriding the property. 有关信息，请参阅以下主题：For information, see the following topics: - [如何：应用 ASP.NET 主题](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/0yy5hxdk(v=vs.100))[How to: Apply ASP.NET Themes](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/0yy5hxdk(v=vs.100)) - [如何：以编程方式应用 ASP.NET 主题](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/tx35bd89(v=vs.100))[How to: Apply ASP.NET Themes Programmatically](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/tx35bd89(v=vs.100))

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置用于页面的主题的名称。The property sets the name of the theme used for the page. 如果希望页面上的设置优先于主题中的设置，请使用 属性。If you want the settings on the page to take precedence over the settings in the theme, use the property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). 属性必须在 事件之前设置;在 事件之后设置 属性将导致 异常。The property must be set prior to the event; setting the property after the event will cause an exception. 指定的主题必须作为应用程序或全局主题存在。The specified theme must exist as either an application or a global theme. 如果主题不存在，则会引发 异常。If the theme does not exist, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 属性设置为查询字符串中传递的名称。The following code example sets the property to a name passed in the query string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 跟踪跟踪并显示有关 Web 请求的执行详细信息。Tracing tracks and presents the execution details about a Web request. 要使跟踪数据在呈现的页中可见，必须在页面或应用程序级别启用跟踪。For trace data to be visible in a rendered page, you must enable tracing at the page or application level. 默认情况下，禁用对页面的跟踪。Tracing on a page is disabled by default. 若要为页面启用跟踪，请使用[@ page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100))指令 `<% @ Page trace="true" %>`。To enable tracing for a page, use the [@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100)) directive `<% @ Page trace="true" %>`. 若要为整个应用程序启用跟踪，必须在应用程序的配置文件（位于应用程序的根目录中）中启用跟踪。To enable tracing for an entire application, you must enable it in the application's configuration file, Web.config, which resides in the root directory of the application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 跟踪概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386420(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Tracing Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386420(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过 属性访问 属性和 方法。The following code example demonstrates accessing the property and the method through the property. 此代码仅在为 对象启用跟踪时才调用 方法。This code calls the method only when tracing is enabled for the object. 如果未启用，则不会运行此代码，这有助于降低应用程序的系统开销。If it is not enabled, this code will not run, which can help reduce overhead for your application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Page.Trace#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.Trace/CS/trace1cs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Page.Trace#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.Trace/VB/trace1vb.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象表示代码运行时所代表的用户的安全上下文，包括该用户的标识及其所属的任何角色。An object represents the security context of the user on whose behalf the code is running, including that user's identity and any roles to which they belong. 此属性使用 对象的 属性来确定请求的来源。This property uses the object's property to determine where the request originates. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 属性访问当前用户的身份验证和标识信息。The following code example uses the property to access authentication and identity information for the current user. 如果用户未通过身份验证，则会将其重定向到登录页。If the user is not authenticated, it redirects them to a login page. summary.span: 指示该页上包含的所有验证控件验证指派给它们的信息。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户单击 `CausesValidation` 属性设置为 `true`（这是默认值）的任何 ASP.NET 服务器控件时，将调用此方法。This method is invoked when a user clicks any ASP.NET server control that has the `CausesValidation` property set to `true`, which is the default. 其中包括 、和 Web 服务器控件、、和 HTML 服务器控件，以及可自动回发到服务器的控件，例如 、、和 控件。These include the , , and Web server controls, the , , and HTML server controls, and controls that can automatically post back to the server such as the , , , and controls. 若要对页面上的任何 button 控件禁用验证，请将按钮控件的 `CausesValidation` 属性设置为 `false`。To disable validation for any button control on the page, set the button control's `CausesValidation` property to `false`. 调用此方法时，它会遍历与 属性关联的 对象中包含的验证控件，并为当前验证组中的每个验证控件调用验证逻辑。When this method is invoked, it iterates through the validation controls contained in the object associated with the property and invokes the validation logic for each validation control in the current validation group. 验证组由将页发送到服务器的控件决定。The validation group is determined by the control that posted the page to the server. 如果未指定验证组，则不使用任何验证组。If no validation group is specified, then no validation group is used. > [!NOTE] > 页验证的行为已更改。The behavior of page validation has changed. 在 [!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)]中，控件不再调用 方法;它们改为使用 方法。In [!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)], controls no longer call the method; they use the method instead. 如果在 [!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)] 页上使用 方法，则将忽略验证组并验证所有控件。If you use the method on an [!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)] page, validation groups are ignored and all controls are validated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在定义了多个不同的验证组的情况下，对页面上的 方法进行调用。The following code example calls the method on a page in a scenario with several different validation groups defined. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.Page.Validate2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.Validate2/cs/pagevalidatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.Page.Validate2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.Validate2/vb/pagevalidatevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户单击 `CausesValidation` 属性设置为 `true`（这是默认值）的任何 ASP.NET 服务器控件时，将调用此方法。This method is invoked when a user clicks any ASP.NET server control that has the `CausesValidation` property set to `true`, which is the default. 其中包括 、和 Web 服务器控件、、和 HTML 服务器控件，以及可自动回发到服务器的控件，例如 、、和 控件。These include the , , and Web server controls, the , , and HTML server controls, and controls that can automatically post back to the server such as the , , , and controls. 若要对页面上的任何 button 控件禁用验证，请将按钮控件的 `CausesValidation` 属性设置为 `false`。To disable validation for any button control on the page, set the button control's `CausesValidation` property to `false`. 方法将验证指定的验证组。The method validates the specified validation group. 在验证组上调用 方法后，仅当指定的验证组和导致页发送到服务器的控件的验证组都有效时， 方法才会返回 `true`。After calling the method on a validation group, the method will return `true` only if both the specified validation group and the validation group of the control that caused the page to be posted to the server are valid. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在定义了多个不同的验证组的情况下，对页面上的 方法进行调用。The following code example calls the method on a page in a scenario with several different validation groups defined. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性来操作与当前 实例相关联的 对象的方法和属性。You can use this property to manipulate the methods and properties of the object associated with the current instance. 此集合包含页中包含的所有验证服务器控件。This collection contains all the validation server controls that are contained in a page. 调用 方法会导致为当前验证组中的每个验证服务器控件执行验证逻辑。Calling the method causes validation logic to be executed for each validation server control in the current validation group. 如果这些控件中有任何一个未通过，则 属性将返回 `false`。If any of these controls do not pass, the property returns `false`. 有关验证控件的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 验证控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/debza5t0(v=vs.100))。For more information on validation controls, see [ASP.NET Validation Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/debza5t0(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format:
## Remarks 需要位于 `
` 标记内部的控件可以在呈现之前调用此方法，以便在将错误消息放置在标记之外时显示错误消息。Controls that are required to be inside `` tags can call this method before they render so that an error message is shown if they are placed outside the tags. 回发或依赖于已注册脚本块的控件应在 方法的重写中调用此方法。Controls that post back or depend on registered script blocks should call this method in an override of the method. 具有不同的呈现服务器窗体元素方式的页可以重写此方法，以在不同条件下引发异常。Pages that have a different way of rendering the server form element can override this method to throw an exception under different conditions. 如果回发或使用客户端脚本的服务器控件未包含在 服务器控件（<`form runat="server">`）标记中，则它们将无法工作。Server controls that post back or use client-side script will not work if they are not enclosed in the server control (<`form runat="server">`) tags. 这些控件可以在呈现时调用此方法，以便在不包含在 控件中时提供清晰的错误消息。These controls can call this method when they render to provide a clear error message when they are not enclosed in the control. 开发自定义服务器控件时，在为任何类型的输入标记重写 `Render` 方法时，通常会调用此方法。When you develop a custom server control, it is common to call this method when you override the `Render` method for any kind of input tag. 如果输入控件调用 或发出客户端脚本，则这一点特别重要。This is particularly important if the input control calls , or if it emits client script. 复合服务器控件无需进行此调用。A composite server control does not need to make this call. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将重写自定义服务器控件的 方法。The following code example overrides the method of a custom server control. 此控件将其内容写入页面时，将使用 方法确保控件出现在 控件的开始标记和结束标记之间。When this control writes its content to a page, it uses the method to make sure that the control appears between the opening and closing tags of an control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Page_VerifyRenderingInServerForm#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page_VerifyRenderingInServerForm/CS/testlinkbutton.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Page_VerifyRenderingInServerForm#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page_VerifyRenderingInServerForm/vb/testlinkbutton.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能在代码中设置 属性。The property cannot be set in code. 它只能在[@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100))指令或配置文件的 < 元素中设置。It can only be set in the [@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100)) directive or in the < element of the configuration file. [@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100))指令中设置的值将重写配置文件中设置的所有值。Values set in the [@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100)) directive override any values set in the configuration file. 在[@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100))指令中设置此属性的语法如下所示：The syntax for setting this property in the [@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100)) directive is as follows: ```vb <%@ Page Language="VB" ViewStateEncryptionMode="Always" %> ``` ```csharp <%@ Page Language="C#" ViewStateEncryptionMode="Always" %> ``` 在配置文件中设置此属性的语法如下所示：The syntax for setting this property in the configuration file is as follows: ```vb ``` ```csharp ``` 自定义控件开发人员可能希望在代码中检查此属性的值，然后再将可能敏感的数据保存到控件的视图状态。Custom control developers may wish to check the value of this property in code before saving potentially sensitive data to view state in their control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置 属性可以帮助阻止恶意用户对应用程序的攻击。Setting the property can help you prevent attacks on your application from malicious users. 为此，可为单个用户分配视图状态变量的标识符，使其不能使用该变量生成攻击。It does this by allowing you to assign an identifier to the view-state variable for individual users so that they cannot use the variable to generate an attack. 若要详细了解 Web 攻击，以及可以采取哪些措施来帮助防止这些攻击，请参阅[利用 ASP.NET 内置功能防范 Web 攻击](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163557)。For more information about Web attacks and about what you can do to help prevent them, see [Take Advantage of ASP.NET Built-in Features to Fend Off Web Attacks](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163557). 可将此属性设置为任何字符串值，如用户的身份验证名称或 值。You can set this property to any string value, such as the user's authenticated name or the value. > [!NOTE] > 您必须在页处理 `Page_Init` 阶段设置此属性。You must set this property during the `Page_Init` phase of page processing. 在 `Page_Load` 阶段设置此属性将引发异常。Setting this property during the `Page_Load` phase throws an exception.
